attributes.action: Information Drive on EU Withdrawal Referendum
attributes.additional_details:
The government should start an information drive on the EU withdrawal referendum.

This should be conducted in the same way as what is now occuring for the Scottish Independence vote.

The government should be providing information now on both the positive and negative impacts of EU membership for the U.K.

This drive is needed to appraise the public on all aspects of the EU, it's costs, it's day to day running, it's impact on EU based immigration and all other matters as regards the U.K's membership.

This will ensure that the public hold as much information as possible so as to be able to make an informed decision on whether the U.K remains within the EU or withdraws.
